page.title: 13ECOLOGY
page.content: The area is predominantly agricultural, with grazing areas for cattle and other livestock as well as ley crops such as;{Oilseed rape}and {clover.}Roadside verges show a variety of species of bushes,but with a predominance of{Whin(Gorse)}and{Broom, as well as scattered areas of fern{,Plantain}and wild plants such as;{Bishopweed,Hogweed,Willowherb}and} {Cowparsley.}Roadside drystone dykes and{Hawthorn hedges}provide an ideal habitat for many species of wildlife and insects. Several bird species were also identified:{Crows,Sparrows,Woodpigeon, {Blackbirds,}and{Chaffinches.}Also,the area being only a few miles from the sea explains the presence of birds such as:{Oystercatchers and Seagulls.
